description: Engineered and deployed microservices using NestJs and Typescript, with a primary focus on enhancing backend scalability, efficiency, and performance.
Architected and developed a user-centric mobile app with React Native.
Implemented responsive front-end interfaces with VueJs, improving user satisfaction.
Designed and optimized databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Ensured HIPAA compliance by working with Smile CDR and adhering to FHIR standards.
Created thorough documentation of work for future reference and onboarding.
Collaborated with the DevOps team to debug and enhance pipeline for continuous integration and deployment.
Onboarded new team members, introducing 4 team members to the project architecture and infrastructure.
Developed efficient and scalable microservices utilizing NodeJs and Typescript.
Automated testing processes with Cypress, resulting in a reduction in testing time and improved product quality.
Orchestrated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins-Docker-Portainer, streamlining deployment processes and reducing deployment time.
Enhanced user experience and functionality of a React Native App through continuous development, maintenance, and feature improvements.
Engineered robust and efficient APIs with Node Js, facilitating seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.
Created a Python-based Bot, automating repetitive tasks and reducing manual workload.
Developed and optimized Cloud Functions, leveraging Google Cloud Platform to query Cloud SQL, improving application performance and reducing query time.
Designed and implemented client-facing web applications.
